trans-unit.source: Imports standard transport binding elements from [Web Services Description Language](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96160) (WSDL) documents with attached policy expressions.

The `TransportBindingElementImporter` type is an implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension> interfaces.

It imports the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerTransportBindingElement> instances from WSDL service metadata.
When these <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> types are imported, the `TransportBindingElementImporter` type also imports the addressing information from the WSDL metadata.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElementImporter"></xref> class.
Imports a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement"></xref> instance from the policy attached to the WSDL binding.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter"></xref> that performs the import.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext"></xref> for the contract binding element.
Adds custom policy assertions to the WSDL bindings in WSDL documents that are to be imported.
This method attaches a policy expression to WSDL bindings that already have attached policies.
The added policy expression contains a custom policy assertion that contains the SOAP transport URI from the SOAP binding.
This policy assertion is used when importing the endpoint to import the correct transport binding element.
The collection of WSDL documents that are to be imported.
The collection of XML Schema documents that are to be imported.
The collection of policy assertions that are to be imported.
This method does nothing.
This method is implemented as part of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> interface and does not contain any functionality.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> that performs the import.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext"></xref> for the contract binding element.

Imports addressing information from the WSDL port and imports an <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement"></xref> or an <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement"></xref> from the SOAP transport URI if a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement"></xref> is not already imported from policy attached to the WSDL.

This method does not import addressing information attached to the WSDL if the imported binding contains a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> that is not imported by this type.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> that performs the import.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext"></xref> for the contract binding element.
context.Endpoint.Binding is `null`.
